title: No audio on Pixel through speakers or headphone jack
content:
A few weeks ago my phone stopped playing audio, both through the speakers and the headphone jack, and it cannot record audio in videos, etc.
I have tried restarting and factory resetting the phone multiple times, but this only momentarily fixes the problem, and within a few hours the audio will stop working again.
I have read other threads with people with the same problem, and think it is something faulty with the hardware that needs to be fixed.
I bought my Pixel in Australia less than 2 years ago so it is still under warranty, but I am currently living in Sweden so unsure of the best way to contact Google and repair my phone under warranty.
Any help would be greatly appreciated thank you!
